title: Chli Ruchen
text: The Chli Ruchen (2,944 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Glarus%20Alps">Glarus Alps</a>, overlooking the Brunnital south of <a href="Untersch%C3%A4chen">Unterschächen</a> in the canton of <a href="Canton%20of%20Uri">Uri</a>. It is located between the higher <a href="Gross%20Ruchen">Gross Ruchen</a> on the west and the <a href="Sch%C3%A4rhorn">Schärhorn</a> on the east.
